dmca.title: DMCA Notice of Copyright Infringement
dmca.body:
-----Original Message-----
From: BR [mailto:brcopyright@pacbell.net] 
Sent: Saturday, April 22, 2006 11:25 PM
To: copyright@theplanet.com; legal-response@theplanet.com
Subject: DMCA Notice of Copyright Infringement

DMCA Notice of Copyright Infringement
 
Date: 4/22/06
 
ThePlanet.com Internet Services, Inc. and all subsidiaries George
Poletes,  Legal Counsel
1333 Stemmons Freeway
Suite 110
Dallas, TX 75207
Fax: 214.782.7801
Email: copyright@theplanet.com, legal-response@theplanet.com
 
Dear ThePlanet.com Internet Services, Inc.:
 
Per 17 USC section 512, I, the undersigned, CERTIFY UNDER PENALTY OF
PERJURY, that the information in this notice is accurate and that I am
the owner or an agent authorized to act on behalf of the owner of
certain intellectual property rights, said owner being named Barry
Rosen("IP Owner").  I have a good faith belief that the links or
materials identified in the addendum attached hereto are not authorized
by the above IP Owner, its agent, or the law and therefore infringe the
IP Owner's rights according to state, federal, or United States law.
Please act expeditiously to remove or disable access to the material or
items claimed to be infringing.
 
I may be contacted at:
 
Name: Barry Rosen
Email: brcopyright@pacbell.net
 
Truthfully,
 
Barry Rosen



Addendum to Notice of Infringement:
List of Infringing Items Or Materials
 
 
Name of Intellectual Property Owner:
Barry Rosen
 
 
The following items are located on your servers/network at the links
listed
below:
 
1) Item/Material identification: Photo of Ali landry

Links:
 
http://luvcelebs.com/photos/l/AliLandry/17111.jpg

2) Item/Material identification: Photo of Ali landry

Links:
http://luvcelebs.com/photos/l/AliLandry/17112.jpg

3) Item/Material identification: Photo of Ali landry

Links:
http://luvcelebs.com/photos/l/AliLandry/17113.jpg

Please note:
For the purpose of expediency, all infringing items have been combined
into one document but shall still comprise 3 separate DMCA Notices of
Copyright Infringement.

Because I have recently found quite a number of very serious infringing
websites on your servers that feature celebrity photos, I must now put
you on notice that all such websites featuring this material are
problematic under the terms of the DMCA. Because you should now have
both full and constructive knowledge about said activities, your
continued support and fostering of such infringing activities eliminates
any safe harbor defenses under the DMCA and you can and will be hell
fully liable as a contributory infringer for any future infringements
related to your hosting of websites featuring celebrity photos.
